WorkItem.ClosedComment: Jothay fixed this for the next release.
WorkItem.Description: After loading my hunter from the armory I noticed a drastic decrease in my estimated DPS, when looking through my stats I noticed that even though I put in a shot rotation it wasn't carrying over to the stats page.
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Shot's not registering on shot rotation

Comments.Message: Similar problem here. I just loaded my SV hunter. My damage was almost xactly the same as the previous version (2.3.10), so no real problem there. But then I did some shot rotation changes to see some sensitivities and my damage was locked. I could do nothing to reduce it or diminish it.
